welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wilmette, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, historic architecture, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves Delta Air Lines, Delta Connection, and a few other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is the main terminal at Midway Airport and handles most domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by Southwest Airlines and handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used by Delta Airlines and handles a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport is a modern facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
